name: Caecus (bellonasrevenge)
description:
You play as the letter z, the least popular letter in the alphabet. Battle against other letters in this slightly different version of rock, papers, scissors to get away from that one letter, e, who is the most popular level. Controls are space to continue dialogue,  . is left arrow, or ~; # is up arrow, or 1; < is right arrow or 2. You can, also, click your choice on the screen. 

Created By: Andrew Han and Bellona Alvarado

If you press z, during the countdown, well, you understood that z is an important letter and will win automatically.
